translations: 易腐败的；易堕落的；可以贿赂的

sentences.sentence: Knowing that you were not redeemed with corruptible things as gold or silver, from your vain conversation of the tradition of your fathers.
sentences.translation: 你们不是用能朽坏的金银等物，由你们祖传的虚妄生活中被赎出来的。

sentences.sentence: And changed the glory of the incorruptible God into the likeness of an image of corruptible man and of birds and four-footed animals and reptiles.
sentences.translation: 将不能朽坏之神的荣耀，改换为必朽坏的人、飞禽、走兽和爬物之像的样式。

sentences.sentence: McCain knew the Vietnamese wanted the propaganda victory of the son and grandson of Navy admirals accepting special treatment. "He wasn't corruptible then," Mr.
sentences.translation: 麦凯恩知道，越南人这样做，是想获得宣传效果，这样他们就能宣称祖父和父亲都是海军上将的麦凯恩接受了特殊待遇。
